TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Sure, worms galore!

I wish for a 4GB extra RAM

Oh, the new page is a bit late, but it's here! Let him in! We've prepared great delicacies!

Granted. You stole my ram and got killed by me using a computer. 

I wish I can force Gaben to make a new game.

Granted. He makes Counter-Strike 5.

I wish for Half Life 3.

This is now your third life and you die by age 50.

I wish for more RAM

Granted. You get a sheep.

I wish for motivation to do something.

You get an invasion from moths, now you're doing something!

I wish for creativity, like @ColdJ's ones

Granted: You see what is possible, rather than just what is there. You adapt things that already exist into things that you need. You care more about the quality of a song than about the artist who sang it. You make many mistakes but learn lessons from them each time. You embrace the positive and let the negative flow past you like water. And finally you treat others as you would like to be treated, even when you are tempted to treat them as they have treated you.

I wish for my own clone army.

Clothes army, who will let you do their laundry.

I wish for new clothes

Granted: Here are the Emperor's new clothes.

I wish to build the TARDIS.

Tardigrades that are large and can eat humans, sure.

I wish for relaxation

Granted: You eat some laxatives and have a vacation in the bathroom.

I wish not to do that.

Granted, you don't do that. For the next 40 weeks. By the 41st week you do it.

I wish to go to the province

Granted: You go see Vinnie who has turned pro.

I wish for lunch.

Here's LAN for cheaters. It doesn't work, doe

I wish to sleep properly

Granted: Here are some fishes so you can sleep.

I wish faster fingers.

So fast it detached away. No fingers

I wish for my old friend to come back soon, last night made me think of her too much and now I lack sleep.

Granted: If it is in my power.

I wish that too.

Granted. You have it now, but just for one person. Choose wisely.

I wish to find my soulmate

Granted.  Your soul is in the possession of the devil, mate.

I wish Australia was closer to my house.

Granted. You have a look through the window and see Australia sliding to you at the train speed.

I wish the kangaroo could talk.

The kangaroo says:"tjfujfkfjdjrirjtjtj".

I wish I can be Jeb.

You can.

 

I wish, there is enough numbers for Jeb123265.

Granted: 123265Jeb

I wish for high octane music and decent canyons for Jet fighter canyon running.

Granted, you get a random guy singing off tune.

I wish to be more active

Granted: Here is a radio, now you can be radio active.

I wish for shiny things.
